endesc: From the middle of the race slightly increase your speed by running a long spurt
Increase speed and power lightly when close to the lead in last 200m
Be in the lead during the 2nd half of the race to gain slightly more power to help you stay in 1st place
Lightly increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight.
Slightly easier to keep advantage if you have enough strength in the Final Leg straight

jpname: エンプレス・プライド
endesc: Lightly increase speed when passing in the back in last corner
Slightly easier to break away when competing in the last corner
Gain a slight increase in acceleration as you attempt to gain positions during the last corner of the race
Lightly recover stamina in the second half of the race by holding yourself back during corners
On the final straight your desire not to lose, increases your speed lightly

jpname: 学級委員長+速さ＝バクシン
endesc: While fighting for the lead during the second part of the race, lightly increase your speed through displaying your Bakushin power
Be in a good position during the middle stage of the race to lightly recover your endurance
Being at the back during the last corner, lightly restores your endurance when you see another horse girl

jpname: 来てください来てください！
endesc: If during the last leg of the race your way to the front of the field is blocked, your power of divination will make it lightly easier to spot an opening

enname: You know, sometimes even I can…
endesc: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, you gain a little bit more fighting spirit and lightly increase your speed
If you can get calm and composed through the race, you will be able to showcase your ability and increase your speed for the last 200m

jpname: シューティングスター
endesc: Overtake the opponent in front of you during the last leg of the race to gain momentum and increase your speed

jpname: 先頭の景色は譲らない…！
enname: I'm not giving up the lead…!
endesc: Be in the lead with a gap behind you at the last straight to increase your speed even more through your legs

jpname: 究極テイオーステップ
endesc: Close down the leader on the final straight to greatly increase your speed even further through your brilliant leg work
Be close to the leader at the final corner to increase your acceleration by changing gears
Be close to the lead during the last 200m to make it easier to break through and find a way through the field
Gradually increase speed during the long spurt in Middle Leg
Increase speed and power when close to the lead in last 200m

jpname: ブリリアント・レッドエース
endesc: Display your power in keeping the lead position during the latter half of the race

jpname: ヴィクトリーショット！
endesc: Be in a good position at the last corner to gain momentum and increase your acceleration

jpname: 精神一到何事か成らざらん
enname: Where there's a will, there's a way
endesc: Increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight

jpname: タイマン！デッドヒート！
endesc: On the last straight, gain speed when passing from the outside back

jpname: 貴顕の使命を果たすべく
endesc: Be close to the lead in the final corner to gain speed as you resolve yourself to not be overtaken

jpname: プランチャ☆ガナドール
endesc: Easier to keep a good position in last straight with spare energy

jpname: ヴィットーリアに捧ぐ舞踏
endesc: Fight for the lead at the last corner to increase your speed through your kingly radiance
Increase speed with monstrous power on the final corner when passing from the outside

enname: Thou, witness the heavenly might of the Emperor
endesc: During the last leg of the race make three overtakes to strongly increase your speed on the final straight

jpname: ブレイズ・オブ・プライド
endesc: Increase speed when passing in the back in last corner

jpname: アングリング×スキーミング
endesc: During the last corner, gain acceleration when in the first position
Increase speed when passing in the front of the last corner

jpname: ひらめき☆ランディング
endesc: After a struggle for the lead on the last corner, it becomes easier to break away during the final straight
Lead by yourself without letting up until the final straight to increase your speed

jpname: レッツ・アナボリック！
endesc: Increase acceleration as you attempt to overtake in last corner

jpname: ブルーローズチェイサー
endesc: Break away on the last straight to steel your will and increase your speed
When being held back on corners of the later half of the race, your endurance recovers

jpname: 勝利のチケットを、君にッ！
enname: The ticket to victory, for you!
endesc: Your speed increases on the last straight when competing for the lead
Gain momentum while in a good position when passing someone in the middle leg

jpname: 優等生×バクシン＝大勝利ッ
enname: Honor Student x Bakushin = Big Victory
endesc: During the later half of the race, your speed increases when competing for the lead

jpname: ピュリティオブハート
endesc: Be in good position in Middle Leg to recover endurance
Increase your momentum during the middle leg's straight with the feeling of keeping the lead from being overtaken
Increase speed in the last corner when coming up from the back of the pack

jpname: ワクワククライマックス
endesc: When in the back in last corner, restore your endurance when you see another horse girl

jpname: 来ます来てます来させます！
enname: I'm coming, I'm coming, I'm coming!
endesc: When the front is packed during the last leg of the race, the oracle's power will open a path
When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed increases
After proceeding through the race calmly, your speed drastically increases during the last 200m
Increase speed in the last straight when chasing someone close to the lead

jpname: ゲインヒール・スペリアー
endesc: During the Middle Leg, recover stamina when overtaken in the back of the pack
Increase speed after the last corner when stamina runs out being one of the lead
During the last corner, gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle of the pack
Increase speed if you're in the front during the Middle Leg

jpname: フラワリー☆マニューバ
endesc: During the last corner, increase speed if passing in the front; increase acceleration if passing in the back
